citations.narrative:
The enclosure housing five African Crested Porcupines did not protect the animals from injury. The animals were able to
dig multiple deep burrows in their enclosure and on December 22, 2023, all five animals were found deceased in a natural
dug tunnel that had collapsed on them. Crested porcupines are known to be voracious diggers and the licensee failed to
put in place preventative measures in the enclosure to protect the animals. Enclosures must be designed and maintained
in a manner that protects the animals from injury especially when engaging in natural behaviors such as digging and
burrowing.
Correct by: July 15, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.125(a)  Critical
   
Facilities, general. 
The enclosure housing five African Crested Porcupines did not protect the animals from injury. The animals were able to 
dig multiple deep burrows in their enclosure and on December 22, 2023, all five animals were found deceased in a natural 
dug tunnel that had collapsed on them. Crested porcupines are known to be voracious diggers and the licensee failed to 
put in place preventative measures in the enclosure to protect the animals. Enclosures must be designed and maintained 
in a manner that protects the animals from injury especially when engaging in natural behaviors such as digging and 
burrowing.  
 
Correct by: July 15, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
